activities: SPHERE works with data that resides on our customers systems for the purposes of defining ownership, access, use and relevance. We help manage the data so that our clients maintain control and understanding of what they have, who has access and how the data is used. We do not access data for purposes other than that and do not use the data for our own business or purpose. We do not collect or analyze any personal data, and utilize metadata as opposed to content where applicable.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For other types of data: International Centre for Dispute Resolution/ AAA as our alternate dispute resoltion provider
